name: Stunning Appearance
summary: Your sudden appearance leaves your foe unable to respond.
description:
Your sudden appearance leaves your foe unable to respond. When you use Startling Appearance, if your foe's level is equal to or lower than yours, they are also stunned 1 on a hit, or stunned 2 on a critical hit.Traits

Archetype: This feat belongs to an archetype.

Vigilante: Using actions and abilities with the vigilante trait while in your social identity risks exposing you as a vigilante.
